name: Thailand
short_description: Experience the land of smiles, where ancient temples, bustling markets, and idyllic beaches await your discovery.

name: Indonesia
short_description: Explore the diverse archipelago home to stunning beaches, lush jungles, and vibrant cultural experiences.

name: Malaysia
short_description: Immerse yourself in the melting pot of cultures, where modern skyscrapers coexist with lush rainforests and colonial architecture.

name: Bangladesh
short_description: Discover the rich heritage and scenic beauty where bustling cities meet serene countryside landscapes.

name: Vietnam
short_description: Journey through breathtaking landscapes, from emerald rice paddies to bustling streets of Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.

name: Cambodia
short_description: Uncover ancient wonders where magnificent temples, such as Angkor Wat, stand as testaments to rich history and heritage.
